docs.title: Welcome to NTN
docs.text:
Welcome to NTN Docs

NTN is a fork of npm with new features for example

  • NR File (NTN Requirements)
  • Log Feature (Linux/MacOS only!)

And others

docs.title: Thank you
docs.text:
• Mkdocs
  • Mkdocs builder
  • Material for mkdocs
  • Github
  • Github actions
  • Github Pages
  • App veyor
  • Shields image
  • Wine (Virtual windows i used for test in windows)
  • Zola (Blog)
  • Kita (Blog theme)
  • Sonar cloud

docs.title: Help on discord
docs.text: Do you have any question about NTN? Ask me now at discord

docs.title: Install
docs.text: For install NTN Use this commands

docs.title: Linux/MacOS
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/Thecode764/ntn
cd ntn
chmod +x ntn.sh
sudo cp ntn.sh /usr/bin/ntn

docs.title: Windows
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/Thecode764/ntn
cd ntn
./ntn.bat

docs.title: Join developer team
docs.text:
Visit this issue Here

Hi everyone.

Welcome to ntn project. a fork of npm with new features for you ❤️.

I am Artin Karimi developer of ntn. so do you like to join ntn dev team?

If answer is yes so answer to questions

docs.title: 1: What's you langauge (English or persian)
docs.text: So please select you language only english or persian (i know a lot persian)

docs.title: 2: What's programming languages you are know?
docs.text: What you are know? Python, HTML, Css, JS, React

docs.title: 3: Windows developer or Linux developer
docs.text:
Are you a windows developer (batch) or a linux developer(.sh)

I need a windows programmer

docs.title: Requirements
docs.text:
Linux or Windows developer
Mkdocs
Web developer

docs.title: The end
docs.text: Submit the form! When i checked your request i add you to contributors list

docs.title: Official Website
docs.text:
The Official website of ntn is here

https://thecode764.github.io/ntn

docs.title: Usage
docs.text: How to use ntn? Read the docs now!

docs.title: Help command
docs.text: By using help command, ntn shows a small tutorial for use ntn

docs.title: For linux/macos
docs.text: ntn --help

docs.title: For Windows
docs.text: ./ntn.bat --help

docs.title: Install command
docs.text:
Use install command for Install packages from npm Use it like

ntn --i package-name

OR

ntn --in package-name

OR

ntn --ins package-name

OR

ntn --inst package-name

OR

ntn --insta package-name

OR

ntn --instal package-name

OR

ntn --install package-name

docs.title: NR file
docs.text: NR file or NTN Requirements like python is a file for install packages

docs.title: NR File Syntax
docs.text: vue react

docs.title: Install package with nr file
docs.text: ntn --ri [file name]

docs.title: Uninstall command
docs.text:
A command for uninstall packages Use it like

ntn --uninstall [pack name]

OR

ntn --u [pack name]

ntn --un [pack name]

ntn --uni[pack name]

ntn --unin [pack name]

ntn --unins [pack name]

ntn --uninst [pack name]

ntn --uninsta [pack name]

ntn --uninstal [pack name]

docs.title: Search command
docs.text:
A command for search packages Use it like ```ntn --search [package name]

OR

ntn --s [package name]

OR

ntn --se [package name]

OR

ntn --sea [package name]

OR

ntn --sear [package name]

OR

ntn --searc [package name] ```
